text.div:
DaVinciPriorAuthorizationSupport

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-pas/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.davinci-pas

Guidelines for conveying coverage requirements to clinicians when planning treatment.

name: DaVinciPriorAuthorizationSupport
title: Da Vinci Prior Authorization Support (PAS) FHIR IG
publisher: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

contact.name: HL7 International - Financial Management Work Group

description: Guidelines for conveying coverage requirements to clinicians when planning treatment.

resource.name: PAS Beneficiary Patient
resource.description: A patient who is the beneficiary of an insurance plan.

resource.name: PAS Claim
resource.description: PAS constraints on Claim resource mandating support for elements relevant to the prior authorization request

resource.name: PAS Claim Inquiry
resource.description: PAS constraints on Claim resource when submitting an inquiry for existing authorizations.

resource.name: PAS Claim Inquiry Response
resource.description: PAS constraints on Claim resource mandating support for elements relevant to the response of an inquiry for details of previous authorizations.

resource.name: PAS Claim Response
resource.description: PAS constraints on Claim resource mandating support for elements relevant to the response of a prior authorization request

resource.name: PAS Claim Update
resource.description: PAS constraints on Claim resource when submitting an update to a previous PAS prior authorization request

resource.name: PAS CommunicationRequest
resource.description: PAS constraints on CommunicationRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to the prior authorization response

resource.name: PAS Coverage
resource.description: PAS constraints on Coverage resource mandating support for insurance elements relevant to the prior authorization request

resource.name: PAS Device Request
resource.description: PAS constraints on DeviceRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to the devices being requested on a prior authorization request

resource.name: PAS Encounter
resource.description: PAS constraints on the Encounter resource mandating support for elements relevant to details of a requested institutional stay on the prior authorization request

resource.name: PAS Inquiry Request Bundle
resource.description: PAS constraints on Bundle resource ensuring that a claim inquiry resource is present and that non-supported elements are not.

resource.name: PAS Inquiry Response Bundle
resource.description: PAS constraints on Bundle resource ensuring that a claim inquiry response resource is present and that non-supported elements are not.

resource.name: PAS Insurer Organization
resource.description: An organization who provides insurance and is the receiver of a prior authorization request.

resource.name: PAS Medication Request
resource.description: PAS constraints on MedicationRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to the prescriptions being requested on a prior authorization request

resource.name: PAS Practitioner
resource.description: PAS constraints on Practitioner resource mandating support for elements relevant to the care team involved in a prior authorization request

resource.name: PAS Request Bundle
resource.description: PAS constraints on Bundle resource ensuring that a claim/claim update resource is present and that non-supported elements are not.

resource.name: PAS Requestor Organization
resource.description: The organization who is making a prior authorization request.

resource.name: PAS Response Bundle
resource.description: PAS constraints on Bundle resource ensuring that a claim response resource is present and that non-supported elements are not.

resource.name: PAS Service Request
resource.description: PAS constraints on ServiceRequest resource mandating support for elements relevant to the generic services being requested on a prior authorization request

resource.name: PAS Subscriber Patient
resource.description: A patient who is the subscriber of an insurance plan.

resource.name: PAS Timing
resource.description: PAS constraints on the Timing datatype used in the various service requests.

resource.name: AdministrationReferenceNumber
resource.description: A string assigned by the UMO to the original disallowed review outcome associated with this service item.

resource.name: AuthorizationNumber
resource.description: A string assigned by the UMO to an authorized review outcome associated with this service item.

resource.name: AuthorizedDate
resource.description: The date/period by which the item that is pre-authorized must be completed.

resource.name: AuthorizedItemDetail
resource.description: The details of what has been authorized for this item if different from what was requested.

resource.name: AuthorizedProvider
resource.description: The specific provider who has been authorized to provide this item.

resource.name: CalendarPattern
resource.description: A code representing the specific days when a service is being requested

resource.name: CertificationType
resource.description: A code representing the type of certification being requested (UM02)

resource.name: CommunicatedDiagnosis
resource.description: A code representing the diagnosis that is the subject of the communication

resource.name: ContentModifier
resource.description: A code representing a modifier of the content being requested

resource.name: DeliveryPattern
resource.description: A code representing the specific delivery of a service being requested

resource.name: DiagnosisRecordedDate
resource.description: The date that a diagnosis was recorded. (HIxx-4)

resource.name: EPSDTIndicator
resource.description: An indicator of whether early and periodic screen for diagnosis and treatment of children is involved.

resource.name: ErrorElement
resource.description: The specific loop, segment, or element that this error information is about.

resource.name: FollowupAction
resource.description: A code representing what action must occur to resolve this error.

resource.name: IdentifierSubDepartment
resource.description: An additional element that provides the subdepartment that created the authorization request.

resource.name: InfoCancelledFlag
resource.description: A flag indicating whether the piece of information was cancelled.

resource.name: InfoChanged
resource.description: A code indicating how the piece of information has changed.

resource.name: ItemTraceNumber
resource.description: Uniquely identifies this claim item. (2000F-TRN)

resource.name: LevelOfServiceCode
resource.description: A code specifying the level of service being requested (UM06)

resource.name: MilitaryStatus
resource.description: A patient's military status.

resource.name: NursingHomeLevelOfCare
resource.description: A code specifying the level of care provided by a nursing home facility. (SV120, SV210)

resource.name: NursingHomeResidentialStatus
resource.description: A code specifying the status of a nursing home resident at the time of service. (SV209)

resource.name: PatientStatus
resource.description: A code representing the status of the patient when being admitted

resource.name: PreAuthIssueDate
resource.description: The date when this item's preauthorization was issued.

resource.name: PreAuthPeriod
resource.description: The date/period when this item's preauthorization is valid.

resource.name: ProductOrServiceCodeEnd
resource.description: Used to provide the last code in a series of codes for the service being requested.

resource.name: RequestedService
resource.description: The details of the service being requested.

resource.name: RevenueUnitRateLimit
resource.description: The limit on the rate per unit of revenue for hospital accomodation. (SV206)

resource.name: ReviewAction
resource.description: The details of the review action that is necessary for the authorization.

resource.name: ReviewActionCode
resource.description: The code describing the result of the review.

resource.name: ServiceItemRequestType
resource.description: A code that identifies the type of service being requested.

resource.name: AHA NUBC Revenue Value Set
resource.description: These codes are used to convey specific accomodation, ancillary service or unique billing calculations or arrangements. They are listed within the UB-04 Data Specifications Manual and maintained by the National Uniform Billing Committee (NUBC).

resource.name: PAS Information Change Mode Value Set
resource.description: The mode by which a piece of information has changed.

resource.name: PAS Supporting Info Type Value Set
resource.description: Types of supporting information for a Prior Authorization Claim.

resource.name: X12 278 Diagnosis Code Value Set
resource.description: The complete set of codes that can be used to convey a patient diagnosis.  This includes codes from ICD-10-CM, ICD-9-CM and Diagnosis Related Group codes.

resource.name: X12 278 Diagnosis Information Type
resource.description: LOINC codes that convey the type of information that is being requested about the diagnosis.  NOTE: The X12 278 implementation guide currently does not place any restrictions on specific LOINC codes that can be used.  This value set is all of LOINC but it is expected that senders will use a specific set of LOINC codes.

resource.name: X12 278 Diagnosis Type Value Set
resource.description: This set of codes is used to identify the type of diagnosis that is being conveyed in the prior authorization.

resource.name: X12 278 Follow Up Action Value Set
resource.description: The complete set of codes that are used to indicate any follow-up actions that are allowed for a reject reason.

resource.name: X12 278 Health Care Service Location Type Value Set
resource.description: This set of codes identifies where services were, or may be, performed.  The codes are taken from NUBC Bill Type and from CMS Place of Service codes.

resource.name: X12 278 Reject Reason Value Set
resource.description: The complete set of codes that are used to indicate the reason why something was rejected.

resource.name: X12 278 Requested Service Type
resource.description: This set of codes identifies what service is being requested.  It is a combination of X12 Service Type codes, CPT (HCPCS I) and HCPCS II procedure code modifiers, ICD-9 Procedure codes, and ICD-10 Procedure codes.

resource.name: X12 278 Review Descision Reason Codes
resource.description: Codes used to identify the reason for the health care service review outcome.

resource.name: AHA NUBC Revenue Code System
resource.description: These codes are used to convey specific accomodation, ancillary service or unique billing calculations or arrangements. They are listed within the UB-04 Data Specifications Manual and maintained by the National Uniform Billing Committee (NUBC).

resource.name: PAS Diagnosis Type
resource.description: The type of diagnosis being conveyed in a prior authorization.  This code is combined with the Diagnosis Code to produce the proper X12 code.

resource.name: PAS Information Change Mode Code System
resource.description: The mode by which a piece of information has changed.

resource.name: PAS Supporting Info Type Code System
resource.description: Types of supporting information for a Prior Authorization Claim.

resource.name: X12 278 Follow Up Action Code System
resource.description: The complete set of codes that are used to indicate any follow-up actions that are allowed for a reject reason.

resource.name: X12 278 Reject Reason Code System
resource.description: The complete set of codes that are used to indicate the reason why something was rejected.

resource.name: ClaimInquiryOperation
resource.description: This operation is used to make an inquiry for a Claim, Pre-Authorization or Pre-Determination (all instances of Claim resources) as a Bundle containing the Claim and other referenced resources for processing. The only input parameter is the single Bundle resource with a Claim instance (along with other referenced resources) and the only output is a single Bundle with a ClaimResponse (and other referenced resources) or an OperationOutcome resource.

resource.name: ClaimSubmitOperation
resource.description: This operation is used to submit a Claim, Pre-Authorization or Pre-Determination (all instances of Claim resources) for adjudication as a Bundle containing the Claim and other referenced resources for processing. The only input parameter is the single Bundle resource with a Claim instance (along with other referenced resources) and the only output is a single Bundle with a ClaimResponse (and other referenced resources) or an OperationOutcome resource.

resource.name: Homecare Authorization Bundle Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim bundle requesting prior authorization of a home healthcare service.

resource.name: Homecare Authorization Differential Update Bundle Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim bundle changing elements of a previously sent prior authorization request.

resource.name: Homecare Authorization Differential Update Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim resource updating a prior authorization.

resource.name: Homecare Authorization Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim resource requesting prior authorization of a home healthcare service.

resource.name: Homecare Authorization Update Bundle Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim bundle updating a previously sent prior authorization request.

resource.name: Homecare Authorizaion Update Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim resource updating a prior authorization.

resource.name: Submit Claim Insurance Example
resource.description: Sample insurance for a prior authorization.

resource.name: Submit Claim Insurer Example
resource.description: A sample payor organization.

resource.name: Medical Services Authorization Bundle Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim bundle requesting Medical Services Reservation.

resource.name: Medical Services Authorization Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim resource requesting prior authorization of Medical Services Reservation.

resource.name: Referral Authorization Bundle Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim bundle requesting prior authorization of a referral.

resource.name: Referral Authorization Example
resource.description: An example of a Claim resource requesting prior authorization of a referral.

resource.name: Referral Authorization Response Bundle Example
resource.description: An example of a ClaimResponse bundle approving the authorization of a referral.

resource.name: Referral Authorization Response Example
resource.description: An example of a ClaimResponse giving approval for a referral.

resource.name: Submit Claim Referral Practitioner Example
resource.description: A sample practitioner who is being referred to.

resource.name: Submit Claim Referral Request Example
resource.description: A sample referral request that is the subject of a prior authorization.

resource.name: Submit Claim Subscriber Example
resource.description: Sample patient who is a subscriber of an insurance plan.

resource.name: Submit Claim Requestor Example
resource.description: A sample organization that is requesting a prior authorization.

page.title: Prior Authorization Implementation Guide Home Page
